item.title: Men's College Basketball Preview: 5 Best Games to Watch this Weekend
item.description: This weekend's men's hoops slate is packed with a handful of must-watch matchups. Here's a preview of the games, along with lines for each.

item.title: New Inter Miami GK Dayne St. Clair Excited To Join Messi, 'Best Players In World'
item.description: Dayne St. Clair was named MLS Goalkeeper of the Year after a career-best season for Minnesota United, yet surprised many when he left the club that dr...

item.title: Counting Down 20 Most Memorable Moments in Daytona 500 History
item.description: We're counting down the 20 memorable moments in Daytona 500 history ahead of this year's race on Feb. 15.

item.title: Freedom 250: INDYCAR Set to Race on Streets of Nation's Capital
item.description: INDYCAR is headed to Washington D.C. for the Freedom 250, a new race this season that will be part of the nation's 250th anniversary celebration.

item.title: NFL Will Discuss Review For Player Safety Penalties Missed by Officials
item.description: The NFL says it will discuss using video review to assess penalties for player safety-related violations that are missed by officials.
